name: Open Your Heart
description:
Collect the gems / to charge your beam / and make the world feel whole again.

Open Your Heart is an exploratory PICO-8 game about being a magical girl, and using your gems to save the world.

Game done for Global Game Jam 2022 Code Chrysalis site (while being an organizer for the site). Huge thanks to my co-organizer, Agnes who let me step away from time to time to curse my code.

This was my first time using PICO-8 and it really captured my heart. <3
